block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold an origami Skunk designed by Nick Robinson in this video. This tutorial is longer than a minute due to the complex reverse fold for the tail. However, this model is really worth trying out. Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Nick Robinson
block_list.body:

  • Little Nicky by Nick Robinson
  • Skunk by Nick Robinson

  • Tri Plane by Nick Robinson
